title: New: Unknown – #008
body: Having grown up through the pages of future lovers [No Fear of Pop](nofearofpop.net), before spilling over onto _**Crack in the Road**_, elusive producer **Unknown** is now spreading his wings and has debuted a new cut via [DummyMag](http://dummymag.com/). Still keeping his identity secret, yet hinting at a future physical release, _#008_ is just the latest in what is growing to be a mightily impressive catalogue of work. Soulful and deeply immersing, there’s a level of intelligence to Unknown’s music that quite rightfully elevates him above many of his peers. Check out _#008_ below and grab a free download.
